item.title: Hmm Help Please lol
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Unruling, post:1, topic:321238”]Erm well ive decided to make my server really nice, so i want all my shop keepers to talk to you if you select the talk option for example im using Wayne npc id 581 so ive tried adding this -

case 124:
talk(“Hello im wayne please trade me to see my stock.”, 581);

why isnt this working?[/quote]

not a expert on dialogue, but i think the case is ment to be the npc id.

just try it.
